ResortSale.productDescription: Airy and oversized viscose placket polo top features a winged collar and wide short.The blouse is crafted from 100%viscose and design plaid design.Ultimately the most beautifully distinguished features are the high-quality embroidery found on the right chest and on the back.100%ViscoseHand wash cold
Free-flowing A-line skirt with an invisible elastic waistband for an easy fit.This translucent omber styled skirt falls to the floor in utter fun elegance.100%ViscoseHand wash cold

Scoop neck blouse with adjustable strings wears as an oversized top and fashions ombre dipped sleeves.This translucent omber styled top features the iconic carefree location'SANTA MONICA'embroidered with high-quality stitching on the back.100%ViscoseHand wash cold

This airy button-up long,sleeve midi dress features lustrous matching buttons to close in the front and at the cuffs.The dress reflects a joyful presence as'Solell',the french word meaning sun,is scribed in embroidered stitching ornamented with dazzling beads on the back of the sheer styled dress.100%ViscoseHand wash cold
Airy and free,deep V-neck maxi dress posses long balloon sleeves and ruffle bell cuffs.This translucent long sleeve dress features a modern plaid pattern.100%ViscoseHand wash cold
Free-flowing A-line skirt with an invisible elastic waistband for an easy fit.This translucent modern plaid pattern styled midi skirt features an adjustable drawstring.100%ViscoseHand wash cold

This airy and free mini tent dress features quarter length bell sleeves and a deep v neckline outlined with asymmetric small beads.The playful dress ornaments an oversized front bow and mother of pearl buttons to close under the drop waistline.The darling starfish are embroidered with unique underwater starfish designs that vary in size.100%ViscoseHand wash cold

This free and airy,v-neck,long sleeve translucent blouse has an empire waistline and adjustable cuff size.This beautiful top features embroidered images scattered throughout the upper top.100%ViscoseHand wash cold
Free-flowing A-line dress with adjustable spaghetti string shoulder straps.This translucent omber styled dress features ruffles and a raw bottom hem.100%ViscoseHand wash cold
